dc_title_s: Map of the State of Indiana : exhibiting the lands ceded by the Indian tribes to the United States
dc_description_s: At head of title: Smithsonian Institution - Bureau of Ethnology, J.W. Powell, director.; Also shows drainage, etc.|80 x 58 Centimeters, on sheet 90 x 65 Centimeters|Scale 1:633,600. 10 miles to 1 inch|General Map Collection
